courseSectionInformation: 2 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. Offered in alternate years. Prerequisite: An introductory course in Plant Pathology and Microbiology, or consent of instructor.
description: Provides up-to-date coverage of prokaryotes that cause plant diseases. Lectures, discussions, and laboratories cover taxonomy, molecular biology, etiology, detection and identification, epidemiology and management of major plant pathogenic prokaryotes. 2 undergraduate hours. 2 graduate hours. Offered in alternate years. Prerequisite: An introductory course in Plant Pathology and Microbiology, or consent of instructor.
label: Phytobacteriology
